abstract: the great 8 best burgers in the us .
article: regular burger at dnb burgers , new bedford , ma -- famed for its best ne burgers in ma , this fab burger joint sure wont clog too much of your arteries . good burger there too . 22 elm street . the billionaire burger at holstein 's shakes and buns in las vegas , nv -- this milkshakes and burgers joint serves the best of the best including the billionaire burger , made esp . to be fit for a king . 3708 las vegas blvd. the detention at bernie 's burger bus in houston , tx -- at such a restaurant that literally harbors a school bus that is no longer used , the heart stopping detention burger will land you in the infirmary and straight to burger heaven .

2200 yale st. master mac daddy , the , at the pig pen in los angeles , ca -- at this famed la eatery made of old shipping containers , in long beach of los angeles , the master mac daddy burger will definately stop your heart . 3768 long beach blvd. the fondue burger and the sonbrero burger at clinton hall in new york city , ny -- besides serving beer and other boozes , clinton hall serves plenty of famed burgers including the sonbrero burger , witch has frites atop , while its fondue burger , has atop of it cheesy fries .

90 washington st. www . clintonhallny . commussell burger bar 's southern bell burger in louisville , kt -- sided with sweet potato fries , the southern bell burger at musell burger bar shall light your mouth ablaze . 9200 taylorsville rd. the mega melt challenger , tomball , tx -- made with beef patties , cheese slices , melted , and burger buns , atop one another , the mega melt challenger burger esp part of the restaurant 's mega melt challenge will definately neglect you room for desert . located only at mel 's country cafe . 24814 stanolind rd. the original diner 's taco burger in portland , or -- this majorly spicy burger at the od in portland including southwestern spices then just cheese and beef will greatly make a hotter impact on your mouth .
300 sw 6th ave. source : food paradise : extreme burgers , travel channel .
